member.name: P:UnproxiedType
member.summary: Gets the type used to determine equality between value objects.
member.returns: The that defines the unproxied type of the current entity.

remarks.para:
By default, this property returns the runtime type of the object via .
Derived classes can override this behavior to return an unproxied type, e.g., to avoid using of EF Core lazy-loading proxy type.
This property is used in equality checks to ensure that value objects are of the same conceptual type.
For more details, see the official documentation.

remarks.para: Derived classes must override this method to return all properties that define the value object's identity. The order of the returned components matters and must be consistent across calls.
